message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $13,000. I know it's a valuable item, and I believe this price reflects its worth. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your time, but I'm not sure I can go as high as $13,000. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,500. This price still leaves room for a good deal for both of us. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product.
